birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区克孜勒苏柯尔克孜自治州阿图什市
birth_place.en: Artux, Kizilsu, Xinjiang, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国维吾尔族经济学者，中央民族大学前副教授，“维吾尔在线”网站创办人。因分裂国家罪被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A Uyghur economist from China, former associate professor at Minzu University of China, and founder of the website Uighurbiz. He was sentenced to life imprisonment on separatism-related charges.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国新疆维吾尔自治区克孜勒苏柯尔克孜自治州的县级市，为该州首府。
description.en: A county-level city and the capital of Kizilsu Kirghiz Autonomous Prefecture in Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省长春市的一所师范大学。
description.en: A normal university located in Changchun, Jilin, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等院校，以民族类学科为特色。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China designated for ethnic minorities.

description.zh-cn: 由伊力哈木·土赫提于2006年创办的网站，以中文与维吾尔语发表内容。
description.en: A website founded by Ilham Tohti in 2006, publishing content in Chinese and Uyghur.

nodes.id: 乌鲁木齐市人民检察院

zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐市人民检察院

location.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市

description.zh-cn: 中国新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市的国家检察机关。
description.en: The state procuratorial organ in Ürümqi, Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, China.

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国刑法》规定的一种危害国家安全罪。
description.en: A crime against national security stipulated in the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 乌鲁木齐市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐市中级人民法院

location.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市

description.zh-cn: 中国新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The Intermediate People's Court in Ürümqi, Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, China.

nodes.id: 新疆维吾尔自治区高级人民法院

zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区高级人民法院
en: Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region Higher People's Court

description.zh-cn: 中国新疆维吾尔自治区的高级人民法院。
description.en: The Higher People's Court in Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师，曾担任伊力哈木·土赫提的辩护律师。
description.en: A Chinese human rights lawyer who served as the defense attorney for Ilham Tohti.

description.zh-cn: 中国维吾尔族政治人物，曾任新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: A Uyghur politician in China who served as the Chairman of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 乌鲁木齐七·五暴力事件

zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐七·五暴力事件

location.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市

description.zh-cn: 2009年7月5日在新疆乌鲁木齐市爆发的持续数日的骚乱事件。
description.en: A series of riots that broke out on July 5, 2009, in Ürümqi, the capital city of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、民族问题学者。
description.en: A Chinese writer and scholar on ethnic issues.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法、监督和咨询机构。
description.en: The legislative, supervisory, and advisory body of the European Union.

en: Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought

description.zh-cn: 由欧洲议会颁发的人权奖项，以苏联物理学家和持不同政见者安德烈·萨哈罗夫的名字命名。
description.en: A human rights prize awarded by the European Parliament, named after the Soviet physicist and dissident Andrei Sakharov.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在保护言论自由和促进文学发展的美国非营利组织。
description.en: An American non-profit organization aimed at protecting free expression and promoting literature.

nodes.id: 芭芭拉·戈德史密斯自由写作奖

zh-cn: 芭芭拉·戈德史密斯自由写作奖
en: PEN/Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award

description.zh-cn: 由美国笔会颁发的奖项，旨在表彰那些为言论自由而勇敢抗争的作家。
description.en: An award given by PEN America to honor writers who have courageously fought for freedom of expression.

description.zh-cn: 一个全球性的非政府组织，致力于促进人权。
description.en: A global non-governmental organization focused on human rights.

description.zh-cn: 伊力哈木·土赫提的女儿，人权活动家。
description.en: The daughter of Ilham Tohti, a human rights activist.

nodes.id: 美国国会及行政当局中国委员会

zh-cn: 美国国会及行政当局中国委员会

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的一个独立委员会，负责监督中国的人权和法治状况。
description.en: An independent commission of the United States Congress that monitors human rights and the rule of law in China.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的联邦政府。
description.en: The federal government of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 一个由欧洲多个国家组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of member states that are located primarily in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国国务卿。
description.en: American politician who served as United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会机关报《人民日报》社主办与出版的国际新闻报刊。
description.en: An international news tabloid published by the People's Daily, the official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 旨在在中国新疆地区建立一个独立主权国家的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that seeks to establish an independent sovereign state in the Xinjiang region of China.

description.zh-cn: 伊力哈木·土赫提于1969年10月25日出生于新疆阿图什市。
description.en: Ilham Tohti was born in Artux, Xinjiang on October 25, 1969.

description.zh-cn: 伊力哈木·土赫提毕业于东北师范大学本科。
description.en: Ilham Tohti graduated with a bachelor's degree from Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 伊力哈木·土赫提毕业于中央民族大学经济学院研究生院。
description.en: Ilham Tohti completed his graduate studies at the School of Economics, Minzu University of China.

description.zh-cn: 伊力哈木·土赫提曾在中央民族大学担任国际结算专业的副教授，直至2014年被捕。
description.en: Ilham Tohti worked as an associate professor in international settlement at Minzu University of China until his arrest in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 伊力哈木·土赫提于2006年创办了“维吾尔在线”网站，并担任站长。
description.en: Ilham Tohti founded the website 'Uighurbiz' in 2006 and served as its webmaster.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府指控伊力哈木·土赫提从事分裂活动，并于2014年将其逮捕，后判处无期徒刑。
description.en: The Chinese government accused Ilham Tohti of engaging in separatist activities, arrested him in 2014, and later sentenced him to life imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府曾多次关闭由伊力哈木·土赫提创办的维吾尔在线网站。
description.en: The Chinese government repeatedly shut down the Uighurbiz website founded by Ilham Tohti.

relationships.source: 乌鲁木齐市人民检察院

description.zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐市人民检察院于2014年7月30日以“分裂国家罪”对伊力哈木·土赫提起诉。
description.en: The Ürümqi People's Procuratorate prosecuted Ilham Tohti on charges of 'secession' on July 30, 2014.

relationships.source: 乌鲁木齐市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐市中级人民法院于2014年9月23日以分裂国家罪判处伊力哈木·土赫提无期徒刑。
description.en: The Ürümqi Intermediate People's Court sentenced Ilham Tohti to life imprisonment for secession on September 23, 2014.

relationships.source: 新疆维吾尔自治区高级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区高级人民法院于2014年11月21日二审裁定，驳回伊力哈木·土赫提的上诉，维持原判。
description.en: On November 21, 2014, the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region Higher People's Court rejected Ilham Tohti's appeal in the second instance and upheld the original verdict.

description.zh-cn: 李方平是伊力哈木·土赫提分裂国家案中的辩护律师。
description.en: Li Fangping was the defense lawyer for Ilham Tohti in his secession case.

description.zh-cn: 在2009年3月的一次访问中，伊力哈木·土赫提批评时任新疆维吾尔自治区主席努尔·白克力“无能”。
description.en: In an interview in March 2009, Ilham Tohti criticized Nur Bekri, then Chairman of Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, as 'incompetent'.

description.zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐七·五事件后，时任新疆主席努尔·白克力宣称维吾尔在线网站“大肆进行煽动宣传，传播谣言”。
description.en: After the July 5 Ürümqi riots, then-Xinjiang Chairman Nur Bekri claimed that the Uighurbiz website 'engaged in extensive incitement and rumor-mongering'.

relationships.target: 乌鲁木齐七·五暴力事件

description.zh-cn: 根据中国官方指控，“维吾尔在线”平台散布的煽动性文章及伊力哈木的言论影响并引发了乌鲁木齐“7·5”打砸抢烧严重暴力犯罪活动。
description.en: According to official Chinese accusations, inflammatory articles spread on the 'Uighurbiz' platform and Ilham's statements influenced and triggered the '7.5' violent criminal activities in Ürümqi.

description.zh-cn: 2009年7月伊力哈木·土赫提被捕后，作家王力雄发起了《关于维吾尔学者伊力哈木·土赫提遭拘押的呼吁》以示支持。他还评论称中国政府制造了一位“维吾尔的曼德拉”。
description.en: After Ilham Tohti's arrest in July 2009, writer Wang Lixiong initiated an appeal for his release to show support. He also commented that the Chinese government had created a 'Uyghur Mandela'.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月，欧洲议会将萨哈罗夫奖授予伊力哈木·土赫提，以表彰他的人权工作。
description.en: In October 2019, the European Parliament awarded the Sakharov Prize to Ilham Tohti in recognition of his human rights work.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月1日，美国笔会宣布将2014年度芭芭拉·戈德史密斯自由写作奖授予伊力哈木·土赫提。
description.en: On April 1, 2014, PEN America announced that it awarded the 2014 PEN/Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award to Ilham Tohti.

description.zh-cn: 国际特赦组织认为伊力哈木·土赫提是“良心犯”，并要求中国当局立即无条件释放他。
description.en: Amnesty International considers Ilham Tohti a 'prisoner of conscience' and has called for his immediate and unconditional release by the Chinese authorities.

description.zh-cn: 菊尔·伊力哈木是伊力哈木·土赫提的女儿。
description.en: Jewher Ilham is the daughter of Ilham Tohti.

relationships.target: 美国国会及行政当局中国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月，菊尔·伊力哈木出席美国国会及行政当局中国委员会的听证会，为她的父亲发声。
description.en: In April 2014, Jewher Ilham attended a hearing of the Congressional-Executive Commission on China to speak on behalf of her father.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府对伊力哈木·土赫提案表达严重关切，并呼吁中国释放他。
description.en: The United States government expressed serious concern over Ilham Tohti's case and called for his release.

description.zh-cn: 2014年8月6日，欧盟发表声明关注伊力哈木·土赫提案，并敦促中国立即释放他。
description.en: On August 6, 2014, the European Union issued a statement expressing concern over Ilham Tohti's case and urged China to release him immediately.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿约翰·克里发表声明，称对伊力哈木的判决似乎是报复行为，并敦促中国释放他。
description.en: Then-U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry issued a statement saying the sentence against Ilham Tohti appeared to be in retaliation and urged China to release him.

description.zh-cn: 《环球时报》发表评论，认为伊力哈木·土赫提破坏了社会秩序，而非促进民族团结。
description.en: The Global Times published a commentary arguing that Ilham Tohti undermined social order rather than promoting ethnic unity.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府指控伊力哈木·土赫提利用互联网和讲堂鼓吹“新疆独立”，从事分裂活动。伊力哈木本人否认此指控，称自己主张“高度自治”。
description.en: The Chinese government accused Ilham Tohti of using the internet and his lectures to advocate for 'Xinjiang independence' and engage in separatist activities. Tohti himself denied these charges, stating he advocated for 'high-degree autonomy'.
